snippet.title: Slave Zero X - Official Trailer | The Indie Horror Showcase 2023
snippet.description:
Learn more about Slave Zero X and get another look at combat and more in this latest trailer for the upcoming 2.5D action game set in the biopunk world of Slave Zero (1999). Slave Zero X will be available on PC, PlayStation 4, PlayStation 5, Xbox One, Xbox Series X/S, and Nintendo Switch on February 21, 2024.

#GameTrailers #Gaming
